addonDesc.message: Tāruatia ngā url ripa hei honongaitua, hei kuputuhi noa

cpyseltxt.message: Ripa kua tohua hei URL Kuputuhi

cpyseltxtnp.message: Ripa kua tohua hei URL Kuputuhi (✂️)

tip1.message: The active tab is per default selected

tip2.message: Use CTRL to select additional tabs

tip3.message: Use SHIFT to select a range of tabs

tip4.message: All copy actions can be assigned shortcuts

tip5.message: All copy actions are also available via the tab context menu

tip6.message: LMB and MMB action of the toolbar button can be switched

tip7.message: Use MMB/LMB to invoke a copy action immediately

tip8.message: Select the immediate copy action via the toolbar buttons context menu

tip9.message: Give the developer some feedback so he'll know whats good and what needs impovement.
